title: Cannot have both launchers, why?
body:
Hi,
So i recently decided to download the Korean patcher, and get an account (to get better)
But one issue i am having is that i cannot have both on (the second with delete the first)
Why is this?
thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

You'd need to install them into separate locations (This can be selected during the installation process) thus you'd have to also patch them both seperately.

>So i recently decided to download the Korean patcher, and get an account (to get better)

You do realise to create an account on the KR server you need a Korean SSN, thus you need to be a Korean Permanent Resident or Korean Citizen to be even eligible to make an account.

Please remember that the trading, selling or sharing of accounts is against the ToS and can/probably will result in your account being permanently suspended.

1. i have installed them in seperate locations and it still wont work
2. With buying the accounts (of lolskinshop or obtgame) is that allowed or not?

>i have installed them in seperate locations and it still wont work

Are you trying to run them both at the same time? This will not work however having both installed and using one at a time should work just fine (I do it myself)

>With buying the accounts (of lolskinshop or obtgame) is that allowed or not?

As I said above, no. Any trading, sharing or selling(buying is included in this) of accounts is not allowed.


>1.4. Can I share or sell my account or login credentials? (No.)
When you create an account with us, we require you to select a unique username and password (collectively, your “Login Credentials”), which you’ll use each time you access the Game. You can’t share your account or Login Credentials with anyone. You can’t sell, transfer or allow any other person to access your account or Login Credentials, or offer to do so. You’re entirely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your Login Credentials. Please notify us immediately if you become aware of any breach of security, including any loss, theft or unauthorized disclosure of your Login Credentials.
Ok. Thank you for telling me so i dont break any contracts
